synopsis.text: Mikoto Urabe is an eccentric transfer student who comes to Akira Tsubaki's high school class. She keeps to herself and has unusual habits like sleeping at her desk and carrying scissors hidden in her underwear. When Tsubaki impulsively tastes Urabe's drool one day, he becomes addicted to it and mysteriously drawn to her. The two start dating and bond over Urabe's strange quirks. Tsubaki learns that she can wield scissors with impressive skill and that her saliva has a mysteriously addictive quality. As their curious romance develops, Tsubaki also gets to know Urabe's few friends like Ueno Kouhei and Oka Ayuko. Overall, the story follows Tsubaki and Urabe's unconventional high school relationship as two initially lonely teenagers form a peculiar bond. Their romance faces various ups and downs as they try to navigate all the strangeness that comes with first love.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
